profile_positions.description:
Support the overall vision and strategy of the Risk & Compliance Function by ensuring appropriate governance and reporting to accommodate controlled risk taking and regulatory compliance. Next to this, support the continuous digitisation and improvement of LeasePlan’s risk- and control frameworks by the specialised risk teams (e.g. Financial Risk, Non-Financial Risk, Enterprise Risk, Compliance & Privacy).

- Member of Cluster management team and member of Group Risk management team.
- Responsible for the Risk Functions in 13 countries: Brazil, Czech Republic, Greece, Hungary, India, Ireland, Mexico, Poland, Romania, Russia, Slovakia, Turkey and UAE.
- Leading the entity risk directors (13 FTE) and their respective teams (85+ FTE) in the entities within the region.
profile_positions.title: Cluster Risk Director

profile_positions.description:
Focus on enterprise-wide, integrated risk management, leading the corporate risk team (control & consultancy) and local risk teams, building an agile and profitable business risk strategy within a digital transformation.

Actively strengthening the global risk management framework, stimulating risk awareness in the Group,  a sound risk culture and integrity and enabling management to evaluate and balance risks and returns in business activities. End-to-end responsible for:
- the enterprise wide risk management and performance in the LeasePlan entities, risk organization structure and culture, including development, awareness, training, appraisal and recruitment of entity Risk Directors.
- ensuring that the risk strategy as defined by the Managing Board, the Group risk appetite and tolerance levels and the regulatory environment is implemented and complied with throughout LeasePlan, and is translated to individual entities in close coordination with the countries to create maximum value.
- the underwriting process and assessment of the underwriting proposals of entities.
- controlling of financial and non-financial risk domains (e.g. asset; credit, operational, business continuity, insurance, etc.) including the continuous monitoring and reporting on the risk related processes of the entities.
profile_positions.title: Director Risk Management – Head of Control & Consultancy

profile_positions.description: Corporate level risk leadership, responsible for all risk areas at corporate and entity level and oversight of entire risk management cycle: strategy, profile, appetite, assessment, monitoring and performance feedback. Steering global risk organization and culture on key risks , internal control and related monitoring processes. Responsible for building and professionalizing risk management elements and practices across the Group.
profile_positions.title: Senior Corporate Risk Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for a holistic approach on integrated risk management and supporting initiatives in this area. Driving strategic risk management projects to a successful completion throughout the LeasePlan Group, in line with integrated risk management objectives. Leading cross functional projects and delivering risk training around the globe in 30+ different countries; Europe, US, Australia, New Zealand, Mexico, Brazil, United Arab Emirates and India.

Examples of risk management projects and areas: Asset Risk Harmonisation, Operational Risk (AMA), Governance & Internal Control, ICAAP, ILAAP, SREP, Non-Financial Risk, Risk/Finance Data alignment, Risk assessments, risk appetite setting and measurement.
profile_positions.title: Senior Risk & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Monitoring the asset risk profile of the Group and of the separate Group companies, creating enhanced insight in the asset risks combined with market trends. As a result, this insight increases LeasePlan’s management capabilities in deciding between risk and return. 

Analysing risks, trends advising on risk responses within LeasePlan’s (asset) risk appetite worldwide (30+ countries). Quantitative analysis and modelling on risks. Maintain and implement policies to help ensure that risk management and risk responses are effectively carried out. Facilitating and monitoring the (implementation of) effective asset risk management practices and creating awareness on asset risks within all LeasePlan Group companies and providing easy and accessible tools supporting analysis processes. Supporting risk owners in reporting adequate risk related information and aggregating this into useful reporting to the various stakeholders.

Implementing solutions regarding asset risk management within all LeasePlan Group companies (Global Projects), developed and provided training to local risk managers.
